fields.name: DocumentEndpoint
fields.description: The connection endpoint for the specific region. Example: https://<accountName>-<locationName>.documents.azure.com:443/

fields.name: FailoverPriority
fields.description: The failover priority of the region. A failover priority of 0 indicates a write region. The maximum value for a failover priority = (total number of regions - 1). Failover priority values must be unique for each of the regions in which the database account exists.

fields.name: Id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the region within the database account. Example: <accountName>-<locationName>.

fields.name: IsZoneRedundant
fields.description: Flag to indicate whether or not this region is an AvailabilityZone region
